outline:
1. siege-enclosure, siege, entrenchment, siege works
    1. siege
    2. enclosure, siege-works, rampart
kjv_def: besieged, bulwark, defence, fenced, fortress, siege, strong (hold), tower.
strongs_def: something hemming in, i.e. (objectively) a mound (of besiegers), (abstractly) a siege, (figuratively) distress; or (subjectively) a fastness
